snippet.title: My Time at Sandrock | Early Access Date Announcement
snippet.description:
Steam: https://bit.ly/Steam_MyTimeAtSandrockt1
Epic: https://bit.ly/Sandrock_EpicStore
Join our Discord: https://bit.ly/Discord_MTAS_T1

The long wait is finally going to end! We’re very pleased to announce that the sequel to My Time at Portia,  My Time at Sandrock, will release its Early Access version on Steam and Epic on May 26, 2022!

Wishlist it on Steam and Epic, you won’t miss the date: May 26th, 2022! 

Help us share the launch date news - you could win one of five $20 USD Steam gift cards via Gleam here (entries in any language are valid!): https://bit.ly/Sandrock_WinGiftCard
